title: Change Plan mode X button to only hide My Lists and show routines (eliminate flicker)

requirements.text: Update the Plan mode X button behavior so that pressing X does NOT switch the app mode (must not call the existing Plan→Home mode switch). Instead, while remaining in Plan mode, pressing X must ONLY (1) hide the “My Lists” (CustomLists) section and (2) unhide/show the “Morning Routine” and “Evening Routine” sections, to eliminate the current flickering caused by mode switching/unmounting.

quotes: Remove completely function for x button in Plan mode
from now, when user hit on X button it will ONLY  hide "My Lists" and  unhide "Morning Routine" and  "Everning Routine" this will avoid current flickering issue

acceptanceCriteria: In Plan mode, tapping the X button does not change the underlying app mode value (Plan mode remains active).
After tapping X in Plan mode, the “My Lists” UI is not visible.
After tapping X in Plan mode, both “Morning Routine” and “Evening Routine” UIs are visible.
Pressing the X button no longer causes visible flicker/jitter from rapid section unmount/mount during the transition.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Keep the backend unchanged (this is a UI behavior change only).
nonGoals: Do not redesign Plan mode or change task/list/routine data models.
Do not change how tasks, lists, or routines are fetched or mutated.
